audience.translation[0].definitions[0].e: The audience began clapping and cheering.

audience.translation[0].definitions[1].d: the people who watch or listen to a particular programme, or who see or hear a particular artist’s, writer’s etc work
audience.translation[0].definitions[1].n: target audience (=the type of people that a programme, advertisement etc is supposed to attract)
audience.translation[0].definitions[1].e: The show attracts a regular audience of about 20 million.

audience.translation[0].definitions[2].d: a formal meeting with a very important person
